mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, title, content, is_private, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{isPrivate}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_private = #{isPrivate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from chronicle_dawnlight.article where is_private = 0 ORDER BY updated_at DESC;

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article a WHERE a.user_id = u.id AND a.is_private = 0) AS articleCount, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) FROM categories c WHERE c.user_id = u.id) AS categoryCount, a.title, a.content, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM user u INNER JOIN article a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.is_private = 0 AND a.id = #{id}
